articleinfo.title: The Linux Documentation Project Weekly News

listitem.para: The OLSR IPv6 HOWTO by Lars Strand got through our review procedures. It describes the software and procedures to set up and use the Optimized Link State Routing Protocol with IPv6. The document also contains links to IPv6 pages and a FAQ.
Rajesh Fowkar submitted updates to the Ext3 mini-HOWTO, correcting some confusing typos.

Machtelt Garrels submitted the Bash Beginner's Guide. This document gets you started with Bash scripting and bridges the gap between the Bash HOWTO and the Advanced Bash Scripting Guide. Everybody who wants to make life easier on themselves, power users and sysadmins alike, can benefit from reading this practical course. The guide contains lots of examples and exercises at the end of each chapter, demonstrating the theory and helping you practice. Bash is available on a wide variety of UNIX, Linux, MS Windows and other systems.
AJ Lewis' LVM HOWTO contains a basic description of Logical Volume Management and explains how it can be implemented on your Linux system. v0.10 Has minor corrections.

Tabatha Marshall, our review coordinator, takes some time off from TLDP in order to focus on her own publications - she writes novels for teenagers. Meanwhile Emma Jane Hogbin takes over Tabatha's tasks.

Talking about holidays, our poor Greg, who published all the documents, and poor Sergiusz, manager of our mailinglists and the CVS, can't take some time off, because there wouldn't be anybody to do their jobs while they are away. We're looking for some backups here, so as Greg and Ser can also take a holiday this summer.

sect1.title: HOWTO contribute to The LDP
sect1.para: The Linux Documentation Project (TLDP) is working on developing free, high quality documentation for the GNU/Linux operating system. If you want to help TLDP, consider joining discuss-subscribe@en.tldp.org.

Help us create this newsletter. We need volunteers who follow the community (mailing lists, newsgroups, web channels) and report events related to free software documentation. Write to us at feedback@en.tldp.org.
The LDP Weekly News is compiled and edited by Machtelt Garrels and Y Giridhar Appaji Nag with help from several other people.
